school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: really good professor. learned a lot, really improved my writing. difficult grader on papers, but fair if you\'re willing to put the work in. class is mostly discussion based and if you participate it greatly helps out your grade

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: Tried taking Public Participation and the course was extremely boring and almost useless. the material is so easy but she just repeats the same stuff every lecture. she says how she\'s an easy grader and doesn\'t expect much detail but then grades the opposite and criticizes if there isn\'t enough detail. not the best professor.
